Important for MERN Setup.line-10: We use this top-level package.json file to define scripts we can run to control our entire application from the same CLI location
Important for MERN Setup.line-21: The concurrently pnpm tool allows us to execute two CLI processes... concurrently!

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && pnpm run watch" "cd client && pnpm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && pnpm i && cd ../client && pnpm i
